cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a string 'eight' instead of an integer will cause configuration parsing errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP to a negative value -1 will cause invalid antenna configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP 設定為負值 -1 會導致無效的天線配置錯誤。
